description: The reform to Spain's controversial rape laws focus on the importance of sexual consent.
title: Spain plans 'only yes means yes' rape law
title_page: Spain plans 'only yes means yes' rape law - BBC News
maintext: Ms Montero, who is part of the Podemos party, has denied that some sentences would be reduced as part of the reform, insisting that the plan is rigorous as it was "a law of the feminist movement, which has called for it and produced it in the streets for a long time".
